column4: I am trying to get my sons old windows game to load onto my new OS but I get all the icons for it and none of them really do anything.  i have never used Ubuntu before, help please?
what are you running them with? dosbox? wine?
sudo apt-get install wine
http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=application&iId=265
looks like the version number is relevant, some wont run. some run amazingly
I am really new to all of this, and I'm not sure what you mean for me to do?
install wine using software center
I have downloaded WINE but I still get this message when i try to run SetupNow.exe   "End-of-central-directory signature not found......"  This is a truncated message by the way...
what version is it? 1 2 or 3?
It says v254.1 on the disk
ok let me websearch
i'm guessing its the first one
OK so what must I do?
ok does the game install or is that where you fall short?

I get it installed and I can click on all the Icons, even the little graphic is there for it, I just can't make it run.  I used to click on the SetupNow.exe in Windows, but that just gives me the error message
ok thats cool, get the latest patch for the game
you may also benefit from the lastest wine from here: http://www.winehq.org/download/deb
Sorry to be a pain, where would I get that from?
http://www.atari.com/rollercoastertycoon/patches.php
I am really grateful for your help, think it will work now.  Thanks again.
if not, ask in #winehq
